name: lpc-remote-editor
displayName: Remote Editor for Rise of Praxis
description: Enables creators on Rise of Praxis to remotely edit code through VS Code

scripts.build:grammar: java -jar antlr-4.7.2-complete.jar -Dlanguage=JavaScript src/lpc/LPC.g4 -o src/lpc/.antlr && cp src/lpc/.antlr/*.js src/lpc/

commands.title: Create new LPC Remote Editor workspace

configuration.title: LPC Remote Editor for LP MUDs

lpcRemoteEditor.connectionDebugging.title: Output Client Communication
lpcRemoteEditor.connectionDebugging.description: Creates a 'Remote Editor' channel in the Output Window containing debugging information.

lpcRemoteEditor.enableLanguageFeatures.title: Enable LPC Language Features
lpcRemoteEditor.enableLanguageFeatures.description: Enables LPC specific language features in VS Code, such as document outlines and refactoring support.

lpcRemoteEditor.localWorkspace.title: Local workspace directory
lpcRemoteEditor.localWorkspace.description: If specified, the path to save local copies of modified files to.

lpcRemoteEditor.protocol.title: Remote Editor protocol
enumDescriptions: Protocol used by Rise of Praxis
